recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 325F. In a large skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Drain and reserve 2 Tbsp of drippings. Crumble the bacon and set aside.
Cook onion in skillet with reserved dripipings; cook until onions are tender and then drain.
In a large bowl, mix together milk, salt, and eggs. Stir in bacon and onion.
In a separate bowl, toss cheese and flour together, then add to egg mixture. Be sure to mix well. Pour egg mixture into pie crust.
Bake in preheated oven for 35-40 minutes.
